skills.name: Preemptive Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 25% chance to increase the enemy's chance of dealing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Cutting Magic
skills.description: Attacks an enemy and then removes all beneficial effects on the target. If there are 2 or more beneficial effects removed, the Attack Bar of all allies will be increased by 20% each.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Medical Support
skills.description: Heals all allies by 30% of your MAX HP and increases their Defense for 2 turns. This skill generates a shield that lasts for 2 turns and is equivalent of half of the excessive heal.
skills.level_progress_description:
Recovery +10%
Recovery +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.3*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
